meanings.definition: Able to be understood or grasped.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the math problem in a comprehendible way.
meanings.sent2: The book's plot was so comprehendible that even young readers could follow along.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a comprehendible way to open the treat jar and help itself.
meanings.sent4: Her instructions were as clear and comprehendible as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The concept of gravity became more comprehendible when illustrated with a simple experiment.

meanings.definition: Capable of being comprehended or understood.
meanings.sent1: The scientist presented his research findings in a comprehendible manner.
meanings.sent2: The instructions on the medicine bottle were not very comprehendible.
meanings.sent3: The robot's attempt at making pancakes was surprisingly comprehendible.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comprehendible as a hug.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was so comprehendible that it brought tears to her eyes.
